title: New: Avec Sans – The Answer
body: Since exploding on the blogs earlier in the year, London based duo **[Avec Sans](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/artist/avec-sans/)** have garnered a host of plays on top Radio stations, as well as a considerable amount of label interest, and it’s not hard to tell why. New single _The Answer_ continues in a similar vein to _Heartbreak Hi_, a no strings attached booming pop number, that’s perfectly crafted for mainstream success. Check it out below, as well as a disco ready remix by **Bill & Will**.
